ja.burhanrashid52.photoeditor

Class TextStyleBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • ja.burhanrashid52.photoeditor.TextStyleBuilder

  • public class TextStyleBuilder
extends java.lang.Object

    This class is used to wrap the styles to apply on the TextView on PhotoEditor.addText(String, TextStyleBuilder) and PhotoEditor.editText(View, String, TextStyleBuilder)

    Since:
    14/05/2019

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      protected static class  TextStyleBuilder.TextStyle
      Enum to maintain current supported style properties used on on PhotoEditor.addText(String, TextStyleBuilder) and PhotoEditor.editText(View, String, TextStyleBuilder)
